definition: Pinghe county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
Pinghe county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian

sentences.english: Love is a great wrecker of peace of mind.
sentences.chinese: 愛情對平和心境有強大破壞力。

sentences.english: Videos of neutral content, such as landscapes, induce no such response.
sentences.chinese: 風景畫這樣平和的內容便不會引起這樣的反應。

sentences.english: To be so strong that nothing can disturb your peace of mind.
sentences.chinese: 要堅強，不讓任何事物煩擾內心的平和。

sentences.english: He is a rather layback person.
Every family, Ann demons and ghosts.
sentences.chinese: 家家戶戶燒紙錢，安鬼平和鬼團圓。

sentences.english: Abundant kidney-yang warms and promotes all the viscera and organs.
sentences.chinese: 腎陽足，肌體各臟腑組織器官得以溫平和推動。

sentences.english: Late 2005, the nuclear standoff in North Korea is coming to a boil.
sentences.chinese: 直至2005，看似平和的核危機將於北韓再度升溫。

sentences.english: Therefore, the diet chooses also suitably selects cool moistens gentle.
sentences.chinese: 所以，飲食選擇上也宜選用清涼滋潤平和之品。

sentences.english: I like the show on Papermaking Technique best, which is so peaceful and graceful.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜歡造紙術部分的表演，非常平和及優美。

sentences.english: Objectives: To compare the different effect of clozapine and chlorpromazine on serum salivary acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較氯氮平和氯丙嗪對血清唾液酸的影響。

sentences.english: The old orc had a look of peace and fulfillment upon his gnarled face.
sentences.chinese: 老獸人粗糙的臉上顯出平和和滿足的樣子。

sentences.english: Calm and soothe the nerves , eliminating anxiety, to calm down emotions, people carefully calm.
sentences.chinese: 鎮靜安神，消除焦慮，平復情緒，使人心地平和。

sentences.english: Don't underestimate how bolding certain words or sentences can make an otherwise benign statement one with emphasis.
sentences.chinese: 不要低估加粗的詞句會怎樣強調了本來平和的表述。

definition: quiet and contented/indifferent to fame or gain
tranquil and even-tempered (idiom); calmly and without stress
